title: Lesson 5: The Bible's 10 Eras
description: Answering common objections with grace and truth.

blocks.text: People have real, painful questions about faith. Apologetics isn't about winning an argument; it's about clearing away the intellectual debris so people can see Jesus. We must answer questions with gentleness and profound respect.
Let your speech always be gracious, seasoned with salt, so that you may know how you ought to answer each person.
6.1 - What is a common objection to Christianity you've heard from friends, and how would you respond graciously?
